title: transatlantic data flows
extract: International flows of personal information are more significant than ever, but differences in transatlantic data privacy law imperil this data trade. ... " In the United States, data privacy law focuses on protecting consumers in a data marketplace.Nov 1, 2017
extract_html: International flows of personal information are more significant than ever, but differences in transatlantic data privacy law imperil this data trade. ... " In the United States, data privacy law focuses on protecting consumers in a data marketplace.Nov 1, 2017
